#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int a;
        long b;
        cin>>a>>b;
        if(b==0) cout<<1<<endl;
        else if(a==0) cout<<0<<endl;
        else if (b%4==0) cout<<(a*a*a*a)%10<<endl;
        else if (b%4==1) cout<<a%10<<endl;
        else if (b%4==2) cout<<(a*a)%10<<endl;
        else cout<<(a*a*a)%10<<endl;
    }
}
